problem.p: Where along the height of a simply-supported beam with an evenly distributed load do you expect the compressive stress to be greatest?

choicegroup.label: Where along the height of a simply-supported beam with an evenly distributed load do you expect the compressive stress to be greatest?
choicegroup.choice: at the top of the cross-section - Point A
at the midpoint of the cross-section - Point B
at the bottom of the cross-section - Point C

div.p: The compressive stress will be greatest at the top of the cross-section for a simply-supported beam with a distributed load since the top will shorten while the bottom elongates.
